resources.string:
In order to use this feature, you must grant a special permission to the application.
This permission allows the application to turn off your screen.

Do you want to continue?

Due to limitations from the manufacturer of your device, in order to use this feature, you must grant draw over other apps permission to the application.
This permission will only be used to keep the screen awake.

Do you want to continue?
You can revoke the permission from this dialog in order to uninstall the application.

You will not be able to uninstall the application until you revoke the administrator permission.
You can revoke the permission by clicking the 'Help' button from the 'Sleep! Timer' section of the app.

Do you want to continue?
